help-file.title: "LIFE WARD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Up to 1 day, dependent upon proficiency of caster Type of spell: Cold
This spell erects a dark wall of power over a room exit, chosen by the caster. The wall attempts to prevent living things from passing through it and will zap their movements if they succeed.
